casebody.data: STATE of Louisiana IN the INTEREST OF E.A.D. No. 2019-CJ-43 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 18, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, FOR THE PARISH OF LAFAYETTE Writ denied. HUGHES, J., dissents and would grant and assigns reasons. Hughes, J., dissents and would grant the writ. Respectfully, I would grant the writ. One night spent with flesh and blood should not disqualify the grandparents. I note Judge Conery's concurrence also; these children should be allowed to maintain a relationship with their grandparents.
